Info

Defined class ATSWarning with attribute(s) and method(s). Created warning message container for console log mechanism.

class ats_utilities.console_io.warning.ATSWarning[source]

Bases: object

Defined class ATSWarning with attribute(s) and method(s). Created warning message container for console log mechanism. It defines:

attributes
__message - warning message container.
methods
__init__ - initial constructor.
message - property methods for set/get operations.
is_not_none - checking is message None or not.
__str__ - dunder method for ATSWarning.

formatted warning message.

ats_utilities.console_io.warning.warning_message(warning_path, *message)[source]

Show warning message.

Parameters

  • message (<tuple>) – message parts.
